parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of center marks that are features in the view

title: IView.IGetCenterMarks
description: Gets all of the center marks that are features in the view.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of center marks that are features in the view

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of centermarks that are features in this view VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IView::GetCenterMarkCount2
to get the value for Count.
Center marks are now annotations. Previously, center marks were features. This method returns an empty array for center marks that are annotations; thus, this method is only valid for center marks that are features. See
ICenterMark
for details.
